revision.text: ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== From {{compound|nci|yāōtlatquitl|chihchīhua|t1=weapons|t2=to craft, fashion}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|/jaː.oːt͡ɬatkiˈt͡ʃiʔt͡ʃiːwa/}} ===Verb=== {{head|head=yāōtlatquichihchīhua|nci|verb|preterite|yaotlatquichihchiuh}} # to [[craft]] [[weapons]] for [[war]] or [[soldier]]s #* '''1571:''' [[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]], ''[[w:Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana|Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana]]'', f. 31r. col. 2. #*: '''Yaotlatquichichiua'''. ni. hazer armas para ſolda- #*: -dos. #*: ('''Yaotlatquichichiua'''. to make weapons for soldiers.) ====Derived terms==== * {{l|nci|yaotlatquichihchiuhqui|yāōtlatquichihchīuhqui}} ===References=== * {{cite-book|author=[[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]]|year=2008|title=[[w:Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana|Vocabulario en lengua castellana y mexicana y mexicana y castellana]] (1571)|others=|location=Mexico|publisher=Editorial Porrúa|page=31}} [[Category:nci:Weapons]]
